title: CEMO 2019
excerpt: KCERA attended EMO 2019 held in Germany as SANGEO.

title: New KCERA Office Opening
excerpt: We would like to inform you that the new KCERA has completed the relocation of its headquarters for a new leap forward.
content: We would like to inform you that the new KCERA has completed the relocation of its headquarters for a new leap forward.
